meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #2464.

td.p: Gregg Rossen, a writer originally from Moraga, California
Larry Eilenberg, a professor from Burlingame, California
Bill Schantz, a software support manager originally from Glen Ullin, North Dakota (whose 1-day cash winnings total $8,099)

tr.td: INSECTS
FAIRY TALES
NAMES
THE AMERICAN WEST
FASHION HISTORY
STARTS & ENDS WITH "N"
